# Quick Start

Get up and running in minutes.

{% tabs %}
{% tab title="npm" %}
```bash
npm install my-package
```
{% endtab %}
{% tab title="yarn" %}
```bash
yarn add my-package
```
{% endtab %}
{% endtabs %}

## Steps to follow

{% stepper %}
{% step %}
Install the package using your preferred package manager.
{% endstep %}
{% step %}
Configure your environment variables.
{% endstep %}
{% step %}
Run the development server.
{% endstep %}
{% endstepper %}

{% hint style="success" %}
You're all set! Check out the [Configuration](../advanced/configuration.md) page for next steps.
{% endhint %}
